name: py-soyclustering

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This package is implementation of Improving spherical k-means for
document clustering. Fast initialization, sparse centroid projection,
and efficient cluster labeling (Kim et al., 2020).

upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
